title: Stock Market Pares Gains After Tuesday Rout
sub_head: S&P, Dow industrials rise; yield on 10-year Treasury higher
body:
The S&P 500 rose Wednesday, clawing back some of its losses from the prior dayâ€™s rout as traders scooped up discounted shares.
Major indexes fluctuated during a choppy trading session as bond yields appeared to stabilize before resuming their upward march.
